Package uoc.dpoo.metrics

Class Metrics

  • java.lang.Object
    • uoc.dpoo.metrics.Metrics
  • public class Metrics
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to calculate the Metrics from train and test model. The Class only supports binary classification.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private java.util.List<Pair> results
      List of Tuples that contains the true label and th predicted one.
